mapper.sql: SELECT id, title, briefinfo, start, end, infopath, num, istake, remainnum,duration FROM t_journey
mapper.select: SELECT j.id, j.title, j.briefinfo, j.start, j.end, j.infopath, j.num, j.istake, j.remainnum, j.duration FROM t_journey AS j , t_user_journey AS uj WHERE uj.jid = j.id AND uj.uid = #{uid}
SELECT id,title,remainnum FROM t_journey WHERE id > 5 AND remainnum IS NOT NULL FOR UPDATE
